definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
(bird species of China) Malaysian plover (Charadrius peronii)

sentences.english: Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines are considering new price controls or subsidies.
sentences.chinese: 泰國，馬來西亞以及菲律賓都在考慮價格控制和補貼。

sentences.english: Rhett bought his daughter a pony to ride on.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德給他的女兒買了一匹小馬來騎。

sentences.english: Perak, Malaysia is currently the police are stepping into the cause.
sentences.chinese: 目前馬來西亞霹靂州警方正在加緊調查事故的原因。

sentences.english: They rode over to see us last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期他們騎馬來探望我們。

sentences.english: Maleic anhydride grafted polysulfone(PSF g MAH) was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 首先合成了馬來酸酐接枝改性聚碸。

sentences.english: English is the official language, but Cantonese and Malay are also spoken.
sentences.chinese: 官方語言爲英語，粵語和馬來語同樣通行。

sentences.english: Flying Gecko The flying gecko lives in the Malaysian rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 飛行壁虎生活在馬來西亞的雨林中。

sentences.english: The results of vitro rapid propagation of Dendrocalamus asper are reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了馬來甜龍竹組培快繁的研究結果。

sentences.english: On the same day Wen also met with former Malaysian Prime Minister Dr. Mahathir bin Mohamad.
sentences.chinese: 同日，溫家寶還會見了馬來西亞前總理馬哈蒂爾。

sentences.english: The first woman in Malaysia to head a university, Tan Sri Ng was the founding President of Universiti Tunku Abdul Rahman (UTAR).
sentences.chinese: 黃博士是馬來西亞大學歷來第一位女性校長。

sentences.english: This is one of the typical malay kampong house.
sentences.chinese: 在途中，您將通過典型的馬來的房子。

sentences.english: Malaysia hascomfirmedconfirmed it plans to install Chinese-style controls on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 馬來西亞證實其計劃施行中國風格的網絡控制。

sentences.english: Malaysia is expected to be held in mid-mid-2012 national elections.
sentences.chinese: 預計馬來西亞將在2012年年中期前舉行全國大選。

sentences.english: Does Andy Liu go to Malaysia?
a tapir found in Malaya and Sumatra.
sentences.chinese: 產於馬來半島和蘇門答臘島的貘。

sentences.english: I live in Malaysia, but cannot speak good Malay.
sentences.chinese: 我住在馬來西亞，可是不會講好國文。

definition: Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
United Kingdom 聯合王國|联合王国[Lian2 he2 wang2 guo2]/United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland/abbr. for England 英格蘭|英格兰[Ying1 ge2 lan2]

abbr. for 國民大會|国民大会, National Assembly of the Republic of China (extant during various periods between 1913 and 2005)/abbr. for 新加坡國立大學|新加坡国立大学, National University of Singapore (NUS)/abbr. for 印度國民大會黨|印度国民大会党, Indian National Congress (INC)/abbr. for 馬來西亞印度國民大會黨|马来西亚印度国民大会党, Malaysian Indian Congress (MIC)
